title: Turrets are too strong now(400 dmg turret hit at 29 min practice tool and 5k hp)
body:
i have 97 armor and its doing 416 damage on me, I think it does too much damage at all stages of the game. It does 320 at 10-15 min by then i would be lucky to have 200 or near AD assuming i am going full AD. This does not add up. They need to have 150-200 static those damage increase things and armor pen for turrets is just toxic interaction and doesn't seem healthy in any way considering they stand with 5000 hp and can get up to 300 armor so they basically are just there to be op whenever they want.

Turrets doing too much damage, gold income too high for laners, snow balling too much effective, little comebacks. all this together is a too much damage meta. But runes are ironically a small portion of this problem.

replies.body: Um. No. Considering their shit ai, their damage should be even higher.

> [{quoted}](name=The thigh guy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=lAEjYbtP,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2019-01-25T00:54:51.477+0000)
>
> Um. No. Considering their shit ai, their damage should be even higher.

So my ally 0-9 yasuos should get a damage buff too.
that is the point. insane damage but little to no defense
And the champions laning will defend them forever so late game champs will be broken and go on a rampage but when they get low they will just go under these turrets and fish for kills.
